data.title: 2024 Best Places to Live in the Norfolk Area
meta_keywords: best places to live in Norfolk Area
data.meta_description: Explore the best places to live near Norfolk Area based on crime, public schools, cost of living, real estate, and local amenities.
data.text:

Neighborhood in Norfolk, VA ,

7 Niche users give it an average review of 4.1 stars.

Featured Review: Current Resident says I have lived in West Ghent all my life and it is amazing. It is a 15 minute walk from amazing restaurants and shops. Additionally, there are amazing public and private schools in the area. The... .

Neighborhood in Norfolk, VA ,

The neighborhood's natural beauty and quaint style are equally captivating. Whether it was taking a walk around the neighborhood or simply admiring the classic homes among the magnolia and oak trees,... What truly sets Larchmont apart, however, is its sense of family. Whether it was lending a helping hand to a neighbor or going to the annual Christmas or Superbowl parties, my neighbors always have... .
